snippet.title: Apple II Longplay - Cannonball Blitz
snippet.description: Full playthrough of the game Cannonball Blitz for Apple II computers, developed by Olaf Lubeck and published by Sierra On-Line (as On-Line Systems) in 1982. The game is also available for VIC-20, and TI-99/4A. The game resembles the theme and gameplay of Nintendo's Donkey Kong game, published in 1981, but with only 3 levels and even harder gameplay than Donkey Kong itself. Enjoy it in Full HD60p.
